text: François Adrien Juvanon (born 13 August 1875 at La Balme, now La Balme-les- Grottes, France) was a colonial administrator in various colonies of the French Colonial Empire. ==Titles held== ==References== Category:1875 births Category:French colonial governors and administrators Category:Governors of French India Category:Year of death missing
title: François Adrien Juvanon
